title: Yeh, if these Darius changes go live, I'm not maining top anymore.
body:
http://imgur.com/Qy60ZHG

He already snowballs pretty hard and has impressive level 1 damage, but lets go ahead and double his q's damage level 1, oh and lets make him scale fore late game better as well. And don't forget our Rework that raised pretty much every stat in the game for him. 

Oh yeh, and we should probably nerf every good armor item in the game too.

replies.body:
Q scales with AD.
At level 1, the blade damage is 20+100%AD, and it's getting buffed to 40+100%AD.
His level 1 base AD is 56, and with items, runes, and masteries, it's more likely to be 70-ish.

So his level 1 Q damage is getting buffed from 90 to 110, and this is ignoring the bleed damage.
So it's not a double damage. It's just +20 increase.

Not even the blade portion?
I'm pretty sure it's just the handle that doesn't proc the bleed.
Yup you are right, missed that "detail".

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EyLgManx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-22T21:04:23.123+0000)
>
> Q scales with AD.
> At level 1, the blade damage is 20+100%AD, and it's getting buffed to 40+100%AD.
> His level 1 base AD is 56, and with items, runes, and masteries, it's more likely to be 70-ish.
> 
> So his level 1 Q damage is getting buffed from 90 to 110, and this is ignoring the bleed damage.
> So it's not a double damage. It's just +20 increase.

Personally, if something was to happen; I'd just flat out remove the heal (which is completely out of place) and use the part of the power budget that consumed to either boost his Q's damage even further (especially since in addition to being a shadow of its former self in terms of pure numbers; its also dodgable now), or make him get stacks quicker.

OT: That said, Darius really needs this, if only because his laning phase is absurdly weak (like, substandard for ANYONE really; he's useless unless he gets blood rage to activate, which requires him to stick to a target for a while, quite a long while actually given his AS nerfs. Hoping to see some improvements in that department)
